content.rendered:
terms + conditions

hold tight while we take you through our x.terms & conditions. pardon our legal-speak

this stuff is important!

program the keeping it casual membership the bare it all wax membership the get nailed membership
selected package
pricing $10/month $45/month (canada) $52/month (usa) $60/month*
benefit service included n/a  one (1) wax service benefit service priced at $59 or less one (1) nail service benefit services each priced at $69 or less
upgrade option *members can now upgrade nail services to include the gel pedi + removal or the gel overlay or the gel overlay fill for an additional $10.
commitment 12 months 3 months 3 months

terms + conditions

hold tight while we take you through our x.club terms & conditions. pardon our legal-speak

this stuff is important!

effective: june 13, 2023

program details:

  • services included in the x.club membership program as a “benefit” are priced prior to applying for any other discounts or promotions.  
  • in the case of all memberships,  “included benefit service(s)” not used within the accrual month will be available for an additional 30 days. after the 30 additional days, the benefit will expire. eligible services are subject to change.
  • x.club memberships may not be transferred from one guest to another or transferred between bar locations.
  • your membership is personal to you and non-transferrable, and you may not assign your rights to any other individual. we may assign our rights under this agreement on notice to you.
  • included benefits can be redeemed during each membership month at any THE TEN SPOT® location in their country of residence.

payment:

a monthly payment, based on the pricing of the program you have chosen, is charged to your credit card beginning the day you sign up and continuing monthly on the same day of the month for the duration of the membership. each membership month is defined as the period beginning on the day of the month that the membership started. the member authorizes the owner of THE TEN SPOT® location to process the credit card as described. this authorization will remain in effect unless the agreement between the guest and the owner is terminated, suspended or cancelled as detailed below. the member agrees to notify the location of any change to their payment information. monetary refunds are not issued for unused services.

enrollment + term

participants of THE TEN SPOT® x.club membership Program (“x.club membership” or “Program”) will be eligible to enroll in our program at any THE TEN SPOT® location or online. you must be  least 13 years old and a legal resident of the united states or canada to be eligible for participation. persons under the age of 18 (“minors”) must obtain their parents’ or legal guardians’ consent prior to participation. by enrolling in the x.membership program, you agree (or, if you are a minor, your parent or legal guardian agrees) to be bound by these terms and conditions (“terms”). to enroll in the program, you must complete the x.club membership application. you must keep your personal information up-to-date. the Program is void where prohibited by law.

the term of this agreement begins on the membership start date set out below and lasts for a  minimum term as outlined above, and automatically renews for successive months (month by month). other than as set out in the following section, this agreement may not be terminated during a term.  

pricing

prices subject to change. rates and services may vary by location and session. additional local taxes and fees may apply. each location is independently owned and operated. subject to applicable law, THE TEN SPOT® reserves the right to increase the monthly fee upon 30 days’ written or electronic notice to the member.

program exclusions

the x.club membership program is not valid with any other discounts or promotions. if THE TEN SPOT® or any of its locations offer a discount or promotion, it would not count as a qualifying service in the x.membership program.

no-show appointments:

we require at least 24 hours’ notice to cancel any appointment, including member appointments, and a credit card number is needed to hold your reservation. members are required to abide by the cancellation policy. no-show and same-day cancellations will be charged 100% of the service booked to the card number with which they are associated. if the service is a freebie from the x.member program then the service will be deemed rendered and the monthly membership fee earned.

freezing + cancelling a membership

membership in the x.club membership program may be frozen one time per calendar year, for one membership month by emailing the location you initially purchased your membership from seven (7) days prior to the start of your next membership month. when a membership is frozen, a guest may not use his/her program benefits or payments will resume that same day. a minimum of one membership payment must have been made before a membership is eligible to be frozen. at the end of the membership freeze term, your card on file will be charged on the next scheduled funds transfer date (terms, conditions, and rules of the current program will apply). your membership must be unfrozen for a minimum of twelve consecutive months before it may be frozen again.

memberships are set up month to month and auto-renew until you cancel. you must provide notice by emailing the location you initially purchased your membership from at least seven (7) days prior to the next billing date and three payment cycles after the creation of the membership. should you decide to cancel your x.club membership program, the cancellation will take effect on the next renewal date unless otherwise required by applicable law. memberships will be charged in full-month increments. monetary refunds are not issued for unused services.

all other entitlements and benefits under the program are terminated when the membership is frozen or cancelled. the location owner reserves the right to terminate a membership in the event of a failed payment or inappropriate conduct by the member (as determined by the owner) which will be effective immediately.

termination policy

we may terminate this agreement at any time by notifying you. your membership will be valid until the date that we provide you with such notice, and you will be responsible for paying the monthly fee in respect of the agreement month during which we terminated this agreement, but no future months. in the event of termination or cancellation of the program, or in the event the enrollment  location closes, THE TEN SPOT INC. and its affiliates shall have no obligation to provide, and the member shall not be entitled to receive, any compensation in any form for any dollars or services remaining in the member’s account as of the date of such closure, termination or cancellation.

privacy

THE TEN SPOT® values your privacy. our collection of your personal information and how we use it is governed by our privacy policy. details from your application for membership (including personal information) will be collected and used for various lawful business purposes, including administering the x.membership program (which may include disclosure to third parties for the purpose of processing and administering the program) and for marketing and data analysis purposes. to learn more about THE TEN SPOT® privacy policy, please visit https://thetenspot.com/policies-terms/.

by submitting an application for the x.club membership program, you agree to receive marketing materials and other communications from THE TEN SPOT®. if you do not wish to receive these communications (other than emails related to the completion of your registration, correction of user data, change of password and other similar communications essential to your transactions through our services), you can request that they be discontinued by sending an email to your home location (these requests must include the reference “unsubscribe” or by unsubscribing with the provided link in the email) or by following the opt-out procedures described in our privacy policy.

additional information

by joining THE TEN SPOT® x.club membership program, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions set forth in these program rules. the owner reserves the right to cancel, modify, or restrict the program or any aspect of the program at any time. members are responsible for remaining knowledgeable about the program terms and conditions. THE TEN SPOT® and affiliates assume no responsibility for errors caused by incorrect members information. THE TEN SPOT® may revoke any member’s benefits at any time if such members engage in abuse of the program or fails to follow the terms and conditions of the program. the interpretation and application of the program’s terms and conditions are at the sole discretion and determination of THE TEN SPOT®. if any term or provision of this agreement is deemed to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, all other terms and provisions will remain in full force and effect and such invalidity, illegality or unenforceability will not invalidate or render unenforceable such term or provision in any other jurisdiction. this constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous proposals, agreements, representations, statements, negotiations and understandings, whether oral or written, between the parties concerning the matters set forth in this agreement.

disclaimer: each THE TEN SPOT® location is independently owned and operated by the owner. neither the TEN SPOT INC. nor any of its parents, subsidiaries, or affiliates is the owner of the location or a party to a x.membership agreement between a member and the owner, nor are they contractually or otherwise liable to the member identified in this agreement.

legacy memberships

effective: november 15, 2022

program details:

  • service(s) included in the x.club membership program as an “included benefit service(s)” include any service(s) with a list price of $65 or below, prior to applying for any other discounts or promotions.
  • in the case of all memberships,  “included benefit service(s)” not used within the accrual month will be available for an additional 30 days. after the 30 additional days, the benefit will expire. eligible services are subject to change.
  • x.club memberships may not be transferred from one guest to another or transferred between bar locations.
  • your membership is personal to you and non-transferrable, and you may not assign your rights to any other individual. we may assign our rights under this agreement on notice to you.

the term of this agreement begins on the membership start date set out below and lasts for a term of three (3) membership months, and automatically renews for successive months (month by month). other than as set out in the following section, this agreement may not be terminated during a term.
